items.title: Preview Julia Donaldson's joyful tale of love
items.description: Two devoted scarecrows plan the perfect wedding â€“ until a rival threatens everything

items.title: Quarter of police forces lack basic policies for investigating sexual offences, Sarah Everard report finds
items.description: The report, published four years after the murder and rape of Sarah Everard, finds more is needed to prevent violent crime

items.title: Twelve more prisoners released in error, with two still missing, says Lammy
items.description: The releases happened in the past three weeks, coming on top of 91 prisoners who were freed by mistake between April and October.

items.title: Media will not stop us enjoying Australia - Stokes
items.description: England will continue to enjoy their time off in Australia during the Ashes despite media scrutiny, says captain Ben Stokes.

items.title: Searches for British hiker missing in Romanian mountains
items.description: His rugby club says its thoughts are with him, family and friends in this "incredibly worrying time".
